the most popular lots on the main page you specify yourself in the admin panel when editing the lot. If lots from an active auction are marked, only they will be shown, if there are no such ones, then marked lots from past auctions will be shown.

too short
After the user completes his registration, an email is sent to the auction house admin. The user still cannot place bids until the auction house admin approves the user.

After the user confirms his email he is redirected to a page where he can add more details - phone, address, etc. only after the user completes his details, a request is sent to the auction house admin to approve the user. The details will be saved in bidspirit system through the usersupdateDetails api
Change his email (e.g. in case the user had a type in his email) - through the usersupdateEmail api. A new confirmation mail will be sent to the user.

Bidspirit system send a confirmation email to the user. Until the user confirms his email he cannot proceed with the registration, and the auction house admin will not get notified on the new registration. At this point the user can do 2 things: Resend the confirmation mail - through the usersresendConfirmationMail api

New user Registration: Registration is done in several steps: User fills basic details (name, email and password) . this is achieved with the usersregister api If the user tries to register with an existing user in the auction house environment an error response code USER_EXIST
